Articles.Content: It would be awesome if the game had a SABRE in it for spaceplanes! http://www.reactionengines.co.uk/sabre.html
Erm, what version do you use? SABRE (in form of RAPIER) is in-game since 0.23, which was released 6 months ago.
And actual sabre engines (or at least called sabre's) in the B9 modpack

As said above, it is already been implemented in-game.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/R.A.P.I.E.R._Engine
